title: Where There’s a Will There’s a Way
description: A cheerful romp about an independent woman in post-war Hollywood.
altHero: Lipton in fancy dress and sunglasses screams in delight
alt1: Lipton at the reception desk at a vintage hotel
alt3: a man leans over to speak to a woman who is distractedly looking off screen
alt4: Lipton talks with a man while a bellhop holds her luggage
